title: The Ring Draws Them (3U83)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Wraith
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, add (1) for each burden you can spot. At the end of each of your Shadow phases, exert a Nazgul or discard this condition.
Lore:	”'If I move I shall be seen and hunted!'”
Rarity:	U
